New Records: Victor Wembanyama became one of only three NBA players to achieve a 5Ã—5 (five points, five rebounds, five assists, five blocks, and five steals) twice, joining Hakeem Olajuwon and Andrei Kirilenko
Key Match Events: The Utah Jazz led 53-47 at halftime but collapsed in the third quarter, allowing the Spurs to take control with a 16-2 run in the second half and forcing 12 Jazz turnovers
Pre-Game Insights: The Utah Jazz played without leading scorer Lauri Markkanen due to back spasms
Post-Match Reflections: The Jazz, with a 5-0 start, are the only winless team remaining in the NBA after their fifth straight loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Patty Mills, a former Spur, scored all nine of his points off the bench in the first quarter, sparking the Jazz's initial lead
